nodes.text: Star Wars: The Empire Strikes Back: Mix or Match Storybook
Star Wars: The Empire Strikes Back: Mix or Match Storybook is a children's book based on the film Star Wars: Episode V The Empire Strikes Back.
The book became famous for including the origin story behind Poe Dameron, 35 years prior to the character's first appearance on film in Star Wars: Episode VII The Force Awakens.
